Looking for a New Job? - Developer Positions in Upstate NY

February 1st, 2008

<P class=MsoNormal><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>A colleague of mine is a recruiter in upstate NY and she is always on the lookout for good developers. I usually don’t post such positions on my blog but Susan has a great reputation in the area for placing good people at good companies, so I thought I might see if any of you codebetter readers are in the market. If you are interested, contact Susan (do not contact me). I have no affiliation with nor do I get anything if you apply or get hired. I am simply the messenger :-)</FONT></P> <P class=MsoNormal><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Here’s what she is looking for:<?xml:namespace prefix = o /></FONT></P> <P class=MsoNormal style=”LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Software Developer to join a growing company in Rensselaer County (NY).  (must be local) </FONT></P> <P class=MsoNormal style=”LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Responsible for coding, unit testing, and debugging as part of the development lifecycle of companies software products, as well as communicating task status relating to assigned activities.
<FONT face=Arial>Essential Responsibilities</FONT> </FONT></P> <UL type=disc> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Development of application components, pages and functions. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Understanding and application of functional and technical specifications. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Understanding and application of corporate code and style guides. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Communication of status, progress and issues to team. </FONT></LI></UL> <P class=MsoNormal style=”LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Qualifications</FONT><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2> </FONT></P> <UL type=disc> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Minimum of 2 years of Microsoft ASP.NET and VB.NET development experience. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Minimum of 2 years of SQL experience (any database, SQL Server preferred). </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>A thorough understanding of general business concepts, processes and principles and their applications in a software environment. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Outstanding communication, organization and documentation skills and the ability to interact with a wide range of business units, customers and vested partners. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Excellent written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal skills. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Experience with various Internet technologies. </FONT> <LI class=MsoNormal style=”COLOR: navy; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.75pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2”><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Positive attitude, enthusiasm, motivation and a desire for continuous improvement</FONT> </LI></UL> <P class=MsoNormal><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>If interested please send resume as attached word document, salary range and best time to reach you to: </FONT></P> <P class=MsoNormal><?xml:namespace prefix = st1 /><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Susan Lundberg</FONT><FONT color=navy></FONT></P> <P class=MsoNormal><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>Capital Tech Search</FONT><FONT color=navy></FONT></P> <P class=MsoNormal><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2>518-435-0716</FONT><FONT color=navy></FONT></P> <P class=MsoNormal><FONT face=Arial color=navy size=2><A title=mailto:susan@captechsearch.com href=”mailto:susan@captechsearch.com”>susan@captechsearch.com</A></FONT></P>
